name: Can't Roll, Can't Control
description:
For best experience, we recommend playing the downloadable version if possible.

Can't Roll, Can't Control is a challenging puzzle game, in which you roll carpets. You have control over two characters. One can roll carpets, but can't control themselves and as a result will slam into walls. Another can't roll carpets, but can push objects.

This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2020, theme is out of control. That said, here are the controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD to move
  • Tab to switch between characters
  • Shift + arrow keys / WASD to roll carpets
  • Backspace to undo
  • R to restart the level
  • Esc to exit to main menu
